BPT  Before soaking up the rays this summer check the facts on sun damage PERIOD For instance more than  percent of the visible changes commonly attributed to skin aging are caused by the sun PERIOD And  percent of the population still doesnt know that sun exposure is the No PERIOD  cause of signs of aging PERIOD Brown spots wrinkles dull complexion  are all signs of sun damaged skin PERIOD So slather up sunscreen is about way more than protecting you against sunburns PERIOD It is your best defense against the signs of aging PERIOD
